title: Summer Homework
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Hey Kanan, have you done your summer homework yet?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>What do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Yeah, I know~. It’s good to have a friend. Both Zuramaru and Ruby said they’re done because they did it bit by bit every day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hmm, I don’t know how to feel about you thinking that I haven’t done it from the start.... But you’re right, so I can’t exactly say anything.... So, which ones have you not finished yet, Yoshiko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Math and English, of course. I guess the book report too~. And the one I’m having the most trouble with, the research project. I know they said that we can research whatever we want, but what am I supposed to do?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>The research project, huh~. Ah, then, how about I help you with that, Yoshiko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh, really!? But what are we going to research?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Well, you have this beautiful sea in front of you right here in Uchiura, you know? How about researching marine creatures? Since we’re here, why don’t we go diving after this and find some new species or something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I see, that does sound interesting. But isn’t that just an excuse because you want to go diving, Kanan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, you saw right through me, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
